review: It is right from Appointment reconfirmation,,Valet Parking,Receptionist Welcome and walk through to doc, Brief by Doc in depth in phases of fix to be done. Pictures depicting pre and post oral hygiene. Even they saw be off to the car. Thanks Dr Yash & Team

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had some trouble with the crowns after my root canal treatment. 
After trying to resolve it conservatively,  Dr Yash had it removed and replaced with much more comfortable crowns at no extra cost. 
I am very happy with the way it was resolved even though it took some time.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had root canal issue *** *** ********* ********* ******** ** **** ***** ****** ******* But as lock down was existing, ********* ****** Clinic remains shut and due to unbearable pain, and based on my neighbour's suggestion, went to  Parasu Dental of which Dr.Yashwant Venkatraman is in lead. I was put to Dr.Zareena and got my root canal finished in 4 sittings. But not satisfied, complained and was invited by Dr.Yashwant. However still iam suffering from the pain. I regret for my choice of PARASU DENTAL. **** **** ********** In terms of fees too they *** *** *********** *** collected Rs.39000/-  PLEASE DO NOT VISIT THE CLINIC
reply_text:
Dear Sir,

We deeply regret that your dental issue hasn‚Äôt been resolved yet. I‚Äôm sure you will agree that the quality of service has been good at the clinic but guess unfortunately the symptoms still remain. 

We haven‚Äôt seen you in along time since you were traveling, do let us know if you can spare sometime this week or weekend for us to have a look. 

We can get a senior most root canal specialist to attend on you along with Chief consultant and we can 200% assure you that we will find a solution to your problem.

review: I would recommend Dr Yashwanth to anyone who is facing dental or ortho dental issues..His diagnosis and treat plan is one of the best I ever came across.. My sister had very severe jaw pain and we visited three(2 ENT and a dentist) doctors prior to him but no relief in pain..Dr Yashswanth diagnosed the issue and provided a correct treatment plan..
